channel.title: Willing to host 4 FREE!
channel.description:
Hello, my name is J Blaze, I live in canada hahah not thant you care, Anyway I am willing to host a RSPS for anyone who needs it. I am actually willing to give up my server that has 1 player on it, To make a greater one with someone else. I have a great PC that is running 24/7 No lag, I can code. (that's a bonus) I have a lot of Exp in making servers, If you need a webclient for the server, I can do that as well. Please don't bother paying me, Just let me play on the server, And have fun.
Hoping to have at least: All Bosses, All Minigames, Most skills, Eco Friendly, And most of all FUN. So if you need any help with it, I am Portforward Ready, Just need A Source And Client.
Some of you are thinking like, "Why don't you just make your own server?" Well the thing is, I made my own server, Had it up for a bit and had maximum of 6 players. I want to go big, That's been my dream. Lol. So you know what to do ! What are you waiting for?! Fun is right around the corner!

item.description:

item.dc:creator: @Bullos Bullos
item.description:
@Bullos wrote:

jblazebucek:

I have a lot of Exp in making servers,

Why can’t you get more players on your server if you got that much experience?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:

jblazebucek:

Why are you so mean? Getalife, Leave me alone. I did nothing to you so gtfo.

Your hurtin me feelin ;_;
